attributes.action: Get Activision to nerf the DMR-14 and Diamatti in CoD #MakeWarzoneGreatAgain
attributes.additional_details: This will save many of us from the heartache of the game we all fell in love with, the game which now is riddled with the overpowered and unbalanced weapons which cause many of us untold amounts of suffering and heartache, along with the countless broken controllers, keyboards and mice. Action must be taken soon!
attributes.background: We want the government to take immediate action contacting activision in order to cease the unnecessary suffering of all call of duty players currently trying to enjoy the most recent season update to warzone.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
